articles.title: 7 latest cosmic images captured by NASA's James Webb space telescope - DNA India
articles.description: Distinctive dwarf galaxy I Zwicky 18, situated 59 million light-years from Earth, is smaller than our own. Within are wispy bubbles of gas formed by winds and radiation from hot, young stars, encircling two bursts of star formation.
